description:
IDEAS NCBR invites you to a Fireside Chat with Sam Altman, the savvy CEO of OpenAI. A must-attend for scientists, entrepreneurs, and students immersed in AI, this is your chance to tap into Sam's insights and navigate the AI waters more confidently.

On May 23rd, at 9:30 CET, University of Warsaw’s Auditorium Maximum will be the nerve center of AI discussions. Not just a hotbed of ideas, this event is also your platform to forge connections within the AI community. Remember, AI might work with binary, but networking isn't a zero-sum game.

The essence of AI is not just coding and machine learning models; it's the spark of creativity that leads to transformative solutions. Join us as we embark on this intellectual journey, shaping the future of AI one discussion at a time. After all, we believe in the power of AI to change the world, and while we're at it, we might as well change the world with a grin!

IDES NCBR is a Polish research and development center that focuses on AI. This event is a perfect embodiment of IDEAS NCBR’s mission to ensure that Poland is present on a global map of AI – by educating the best specialists and allowing them to conduct research on the highest global level.
title: A conversation with OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman | Hosted by IDEAS NCBR
